techful.title: TechFUL (Professional Work)
techful.description: A programming skill assessment platform by 444 Inc., featuring over 700 unique challenges and products like Techthon and TechFUL PRO to enhance development skills.

movieDb.title: Personalized Movie Db
movieDb.description: Simple movie database interface designed to track, save and organize watchlist and favorites, tailored to personal preferences.

assetTracker.title: Asset Tracker
assetTracker.description: Personalized asset tracking dashboard to monitor favorite assets and customizable charts, designed for simplicity and ease of use.
